checkForTransaction

public static void checkForTransaction(boolean autocommit,
                                       boolean txOpen)
Verifies that if autocommit is disabled, a transaction is open.

Parameters:
autocommit - indicates if autocommit is enabled or disabled
txOpen - indicates if there is a transaction open or not

Parameters:

policy - PersistencePolicy to use

checkMapFileClass

                                     XmlResourceParser parser)
Verifies that the map file referenced by the given XmlResourceParser references the given Class.

Parameters:
c - the Class to check for
parser - the XmlResourceParser reading the XML file
